pros: Rich perforated nubuck leather is lined for all day comfort
cons: Sizing is difficult — they run large, and many found they fell between sizes

customer_reviews.title: Really Amazon!!!! Used and abused.
customer_reviews.text: You really need to put measures in place to check for quality especially on a $200+ dollar pair of shoes. Extremely disappointed w this experience especially on Xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Jerkovich

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!! Fakes
customer_reviews.text: These are 100% FAKE! I have two authentic pairs. These are too tight, too stiff, the Vince label on the back is different, and the perforation is completely different!! They smell like plastic! Please please beware.
customer_reviews.author: C Amber Henderek

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous shoe for those with high instep.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say enough good things about this shoe! They are good quality and seem to be made for my foot. That being said I think I know why some reviewers say they run too big. I have a VERY high instep. Shoes made like these usually kill my feet because they cut into top of my foot and practically cut off circulation. These shoes seem to be designed and made by someone with the same problem because they fit me like a glove. A miracle for me but if you have a low arch they will swallow you.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA FONTENOT

customer_reviews.title: one of the best shoe purchases I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: I would give these 10 stars if I could! I held off forever because who wants to pay 195 for slip on sneakers. I finally bit the bullet after trying and hating so many pairs. I have NO regrets! The are incredibly comfy and after wearing a couple times they mold to your foot. one of the best shoe purchases I have ever made! I wear them almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: jd9085

customer_reviews.title: Great All Day Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect casual walking shoe, I own several in multiple colors and consider them a must have - they look great with jeans or shorts and the neutral colors are great for all seasons. I live in these! Size down, normally I'm a 9 but the 8 fit me perfectly, they do loosen up on the sides after 4-5 times of wearing them. I can walk around for hours and hours in these.
customer_reviews.author: Stina

customer_reviews.title: Not good if your foot runs on the wide side
customer_reviews.text: These would've been great but they are too tight on me. I ordered the size down and the length fits but they were too narrow for my foot. I'm definitely on the wider side but from reviews that didn't seem to be a problem but they definitely weren't out of the box perfect for me and I'm not willing to wait for them to be at that price. Otherwise - I liked the woodsmoke color and the cushiness of the foot bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisamay

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Fashion!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Vince Blair sneakers. I originally got them in Woodsmoke and was instantly hooked. They are comfortable and the material molds to the shape of your foot. I didn't have to break them in; they fit perfectly from day one. When I saw the pink pair on sale, I knew I had to have them. These shoes are expensive, yes, but I promise you are paying for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey J. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: These are Fakes - Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these from Vince and online here, they knock off. I know when I opened the box but didn't want to believe it. I have worn these for 2 months and the soles have already cracked and useable. Purchase from Nordstroms or Vince store direct to make sure you are getting what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Starr

customer_reviews.title: These are true to size
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes, comfortable leather. Many people say these run big, and I was skeptical because I never (ever) need a size down in sneakers. But, I tried to go down half a size as suggested...and they were way too tight. I need my regular shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe, runs big
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoe, but turns out this particular style runs large. I wear a 9.5M in Vince heels. Only need a 9M in the Blair sneaker. Quite stylish and the gunmetal color is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I want these so badly, but...
customer_reviews.text: I tried these in several sizes. It is true to size down a 1/2 size, but no matter what size I did, they hurt my feet so badly (at the widest part of the foot). I don't even consider myself to have a wide foot. I've never had this problem before. I'm sad, I really, really want these shoes. But, the pain just wouldn't be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed the sizing isn't accurate
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed the sizing isn't accurate. I purchased an 8.5, which fit more like a 9.5. It is HUGE and the quality was a bit disappointing in the material. The sole is durable, which I love, but the material looks a bit cheap for the price. I'd recommend spending money on some other slide ons, like LOVE, has some fantastic shoes out.
customer_reviews.author: B D

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are very comfortable and very well made.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe looks great and is very well made. I used it for leisure and look well put together. It is also very comfortable. I get many compliments whenever I used them, which is very often!
customer_reviews.author: Iris Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you live in the USA.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit true to size. I’ve purchased Vince shoes in the past and never had an issue with size. Always fit true to size, not these! Also do NOT buy from this company if you live in the United States. They do not cover return postage. I went to send mine back at USPS and the cost was $40!!! What😤 no flipping way are these going back. And I will not be buying from this Canadian compamy again.
customer_reviews.author: Camp Cambel

customer_reviews.title: Based off of everyone's reviews, I ordered a half ...
customer_reviews.text: Based off of everyone's reviews, I ordered a half size down and they were too small so I'm exchanging. I'd suggest going with your regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the Box?
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fit and style of the shoe, but it did not come in the original box. They were packed in the shipping box only. I opted for a similar pair I purchased in a department store
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my eye on these for years but never tried them on in the stores. I have narrow feet and did not think they would fit. But they did, perfectly! Worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Ghoward

customer_reviews.title: So Chic.
customer_reviews.text: Fits a bit big like all other reviewers said. They broke in very quickly. When the bottoms got scuffed, I used a mr clean magic eraser and they looked new again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly like all my Vince shoes from major department stores
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. This Vince pair is exactly like the shoe I tried at Newman Marcus.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Tabin

customer_reviews.title: they are VERY comfortable. Great casual slip-ons that are in style
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of these in different colors and patterns. As long as you do not need a lot of extra support, they are VERY comfortable. Great casual slip-ons that are in style, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Terri K.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They go with everything and are SO comfortable. Plus, the lift adds the perfect amount of height.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Super comfort, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair that I’ve purchased for my wife. She absolutely loves them! As stated “ Runs large, order one size down”
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 10, but had to go down half a size.
customer_reviews.author: amy carlin

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9/9.5. I bought a 9 this time and it seems like it runs large as my foot can slip in and out pretty easily, even during walking. That said, I LOVE LOVE LOVE this shoe. It's super comfy and chic looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie A

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes that go with everything from jeans
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes that go with everything from jeans, shorts, and leggings. I notice that several people say they run big, but I am a true 8.5 and ordered that and it was exactly right. Only took off one star because they are $200! I'd order every color for $100, but $200 is quite a bit for such a casual shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Smith

customer_reviews.title: It has same size number on it, but right ...
customer_reviews.text: It has same size number on it, but right shoe is bigger then left shoe. I can't wear it.
customer_reviews.author: HAERAN LEE

customer_reviews.title: Love how these look and feel.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is very snug at first but once you wear them a few times they fit great. Sizing runs a half size small I feel. Love the Taupe Smoke House color. They look great with so many different outfits. Will be buying the whIte pair next.
customer_reviews.author: farm girl on pond beach

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of these shoes. True to size but maybe a tad bit tight when you first get them but stretch out quickly. Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Owned this shoe before. Reordered, the shoe fits like a flimsy slipper. No structure. Disappointed to say the least. I wear a 9 and ordered an 8.5 because they do run large. This shoe has to have a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.text: My feet are on the wider side, so they aren't as comfortable as everyone says that have "normal" width feet but I am still happy I got them. I did get a half a size down which I'm happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style and most of all comfort- VINCE has it!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are incredibly comfortable....and, very stylish!! I looked at several slip-ones....but most were very heavy. I have back issues...so i wanted shoes that provided comfort...and, stability!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would be a really great shoes if the heel wasn't so wide.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Well Made shoes that the wife is really happy with.
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes for my wife as a christmas present. She loves them and thinks that they are really well made shoe. I was a little hesitant about spending a bunch of $ on a brand I didn't know but when the shoes came, they did seem to be made from a good quality leather. And most importantly they made my wife really happy. so long of the short, happy wife, happy life :)
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Kachmar

customer_reviews.title: Walking Shoe Extraordinary
customer_reviews.text: Love the arch support and comfort when walking all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I own 5 pairs. So very comfortable and stylish. ((((Love)))))
customer_reviews.author: Greta B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the sneaker for its comfort and looks. Just want others to know it runs a little large
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Allison

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and easy to wear with many summer outfits
customer_reviews.author: lilly

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, had to reorder in half size smaller
customer_reviews.author: iac

customer_reviews.title: They keep my feet the perfect temperature somehow my feet don't get cold but they ...
customer_reviews.text: These are sooooooo comfy. They keep my feet the perfect temperature somehow my feet don't get cold but they also don't get all sweaty despite not wearing socks. I love them! Update: 9 months in and they are falling apart ☹️ They are still really comfy but I would hope they would last a lot longer than 9 months, I really don't even wear them that often and it really sucks they are falling apart already.
customer_reviews.author: Daph

customer_reviews.title: Really like the look & quality
customer_reviews.text: Returned for 1/2 size smaller. Really like the look & quality.
customer_reviews.author: Donna R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the shoes and will give them a good workout when in Europe!
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but way too big.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe seems to be made of good quality leather which is to be expected considering the price but it was way too big. I usually wear a size 11 which is what I bought this time and my foot was literally slipping out of the shoe when I tried to walk in it. There was no half size down available so I returned the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: NYCLawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Very comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Very comfortable right out of the box. Read that they were a little big so went down half a size and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker best one without laces !
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair . A great sneaker without laces . Very comfortable and well made ! Looks great too ! I bought 81/2 usually wear a nine .
customer_reviews.author: Susan Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I find that it runs very large, but know next size down would be too small.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Sooooooo comfortable. I saw these on a fashion blog and loved the look of them. I rarely wear flats so when I see a pair that is fashionable I'm anxious to give them a try. I wore these all day without socks and it was like walking on air. I wear a 7.5 or 8 and the 7.5 fits perfect in these. I may buy the other color in these. I also highly recommend the seller
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 9 but after reading the reviews I bought a size 8.5 and they perfect in the length. They were slightly snug in the width when I first tried them on but after a few wears they loosened up and are now very comfortable. There is a light cushion all through the footbed but no arch support or cup around the heel for those looking for that information. This is my first non-lace sneaker and I am very happy with them. The color (woodsmoke) is neutral and goes with so many things!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lowe

product_meta.title: Vince Women's Blair Slip On Sneakers
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
